name: Aranda Purple Plaid/Blue Pinstripe
description: Fiore makes it easy to be fashionable with the Aranda. This unique top combines a dress shirt and waistcoat styled in complementary colors. The shirt comes with short sleeves cuffed at the elbows while the waistcoat features a small geometric flourish on the front pockets that's mirrored across the back.
description_cn: 菲奥蕾的阿兰达衬衣让时尚唾手可得。这件独一无二的上衣结合了颜色互补的西装衬衣与马甲；衬衣袖口卷到了手肘处，马甲前方的口袋与背部加入了简单的几何图形设计。
